result.execSummary:
The defendant Amanda Lee Jalowitz was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case.

  • Fail/Report to Jail (Misdemeanor), a class A misdemeanor, Wisconsin Statutes 946.425(1r)(a).

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

supervisions.notes: $379.00 fine, set up payment plan today, 1-6-15.
$200 DNA surcharge.  Set up payment plan today, 1-6-15.

judgments.dispoDesc: State moves to Amend Ct #1 to Misdemeanor failure to report to jail.  Court grants motion to amend.  DEF pleads NO Contest.  Found Guilty.  Sentenced to 15 days in county jail, with Huber. Report to jail 1-19-15 by 3:00 pm.  Fine/costs totalling $579.  $250 bond to be applied to fine.  Set up payment plan today, 1-6-15.
judgments.action: Guilty Due to No Contest Plea

charges.dispoDesc: Guilty Due to No Contest Plea

records.addlTxt: of right to seek postconviction relief.

Defendant Amanda Lee Jalowitz in court with attorney Martin Jarvis.  John Martin Yackel appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  DE advised of rights and penalties; DE waives rights; parties stipulate to facts.
State moves to Amend Ct #1 to Misdemeanor failure to report to jail.  Court grants motion to amend.  DEF pleads NO Contest.  Found Guilty.  Sentenced to 15 days in county jail, with Huber. Report to jail 1-19-15 by 3:00 pm.  Fine/costs totalling $579.  $250 bond to be applied to fine.  Set up payment plan today, 1-6-15.

Defendant Amanda Lee Jalowitz in court with attorney Martin Jarvis.  John Martin Yackel appeared for the State of Wisconsin. waives right to preliminary hearing, and move to arraignment,   Acknowledges receipt of information, NG plea  Scheduling conference scheduled for January 6, 2015 at 11:00 am.

Defendant Amanda Lee Jalowitz in court, in custody, appearing by video.  John Martin Yackel appeared for the State of Wisconsin.
 Defendant advised of rights/penalties, acknowledges receipt of complaint, waives reading of complaint, wishes to contact counsel, qualifies for public defender.  Adjourned initial appearance scheduled for October 28, 2014 at 02:30 pm.  Court orders $250 cash bond.
